bradleyross.library.dcm4che3

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.library.dcm4che3.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    Handles information on the local server and the remote servers that can be use for processing.
    Author:
    Bradley Ross

        public static void testLoad()
        Set up a DICOM servers that can be used for requests.
        DICOMSERVERDICOMSERVER@www.dicomserver.co.uk:104

        An additional entry was set up with the name BADENTRY for testing purposes. This entry deliberately points to a nonexistent server.
